column4: Does anyone know the program that lets you resize your screen, and then posts the specs to permanently change it in xorg?
_mikem, there's another program in Ubuntu that lets you stretch the actual screen, and then posts the specs so you know exactly what to change.
anyway, do you know another way for me to know exactly what to change to regain the square inch of my screen that i'm missing?
it's an inch of screen space that's not being taken up.
you can make the change in xorg, because i've used the program before to figure out what to change... i just can't find it anymore
I had issues with my monitors on ubu initially, it was actually waaay oversized
